Room.Name: Warm-Up Arena
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Oceancrest Central Arena's Warm-up Arena.
Room.LongDescription: The Warm-Up Arena is designed to prepare combatants for the thrills and excitement which awaits them to the south in the Knight's Honor Arena and the Gladiator's Pits. There's not much of a crowd watching you here as they're all down further south where all the excitement and killing is. There does seem to be quite a bit of blood on the ground, though.
